title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: MUVE-Based Scientific Inquiry Project: The Secrets and Ecology of Lakes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Ecosystem Concepts and Scientific Inquiry Methodology Understanding
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze causes and effects of ecosystem issues (e.g., eutrophication) using scientific inquiry methods in a MUVE environment.
Learners can collaboratively derive solutions using a problem-based learning (PBL) approach and present conclusions based on simulation results.
Learners can collect and interpret virtual ecosystem data to write reports on environmental issues based on scientific evidence.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
